availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Whittaker (Shelby County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Married to Susannah Jewell Whittaker in Spencer County, Kentucky, on June 30, 1858. Father of Thomas Whittaker, Elijah A. Whittaker, James J. Whittaker, and Eddie B. Whittaker. Blacksmith in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 146.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, Shelbyville, p. 185C.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482641.
